join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set urban on
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set cooldown 5
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!urban
no_send

urban_define {"Phrase": "something", "Def": "It's something."}
handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!urban something
send hortbot #foobar [HB] "It's something."


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=2;subscriber=1 :random!random@random.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!urban something
no_send


clock_forward 1h


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=2;subscriber=1 :random!random@random.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!urban something
send hortbot #foobar [HB] "It's something."


urban_define {"Phrase": "something", "Err": "ErrNotFound"}
handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!urban something
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Definition not found.


urban_define {"Phrase": "something", "Err": "ErrServerError"}
handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!urban something
send hortbot #foobar [HB] An Urban Dictionary server error has occurred.


urban_define {"Phrase": "something", "Err": "ErrUnknown"}
handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!urban something
no_send
